name: 4th Scopus-Indexed Springer International Conference on Computer Networks, Big Data and IoT
content: In this digital era, Internet of Things \[IoT\], big data and computer networks are dedicated to provide new innovative contributions focused towards the development and deployment of wide range of intelligent and networked information systems. Smart IoT and big data platform allows the networked devices to communicate along with the core values of volume, variety and velocity which in turn leads to the integration of Big data and IoT with advanced machine learning and other advanced techniques. This International Conference on Computer networks, Big Data and IoT \[ICCBI 2021\] will provide an interdisciplinary platform to bring together scientists, researchers and academicians to present and exchange the ideas of the latest research works and results related to IoT, big data and computer networking topics.
